subtasks: Sit in green road tractor.
Engage clutch and start engine.
Reverse tractor to back into pasture.
Align tractor with desired path.
Drive tractor forward into pasture.
Approach trailer with tractor.
Align tractor's trailer rack with horse's halter.
Slowly drive tractor forward to load horse.
Secure horse in trailer.
Repeat for remaining horses.
Approach trailer at gate.
Open trailer gate.
Safely lead horse from trailer to pasture.
Secure horse in pasture.
Locate hay bale.
Dislodge hay from bale.
Distribute hay into horse feeders or manger.

tasks.task: Attach lights to side of tractor.
subtasks: Identify appropriate lights for attachment.
Detach existing lights or prepare attachment points.
Install mounting brackets or hitch on tractor.
Connect electrical harness or wires to lights.
Secure lights firmly to tractor.

tasks.task: Maintain tractor hydraulic system while driving.
subtasks: Monitor hydraulic fluid levels.
Check for leaks or irregularities in hydraulic lines.
Adjust hydraulic settings as needed during operation.
Identify damaged or loose components of trailer hitch.
Remove hitch pin or trailer coupler.
Inspect trailer hitch for wear or corrosion.
Replace or tighten parts as necessary.
Test hitch functionality by towing a light load.
